title: Law in Eastern Europe
additional-notes: This is a Dutch publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. Some volumes list multiple places of publication, including locations and distributors in the United States.

This is a monographic series.  Before concluding an issue is in the public domain, search for renewals for an issue under its distinctive title. We have not systematically checked issue titles for this serial.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Shelton Henderson for copyright research on this title.
